opencore-amr:

32-bit:
./configure --enable-static --disable-shared --disable-amrnb-encoder
make

64-bit:
./configure --host=x86_64-w64-mingw32 --enable-static --disable-shared --disable-amrnb-encoder
make

----------------------------------------------
Speex:

32-bit:
./configure --enable-sse --enable-static --disable-shared
make

64-bit:
./configure --host=x86_64-w64-mingw32 --enable-sse --enable-static --disable-shared

----------------------------------------------
AOM

32-bit
cmake -G"Unix Makefiles" /path/to/aom/ -DCONFIG_AV1_ENCODER=0 -DENABLE_TESTS=0 -DCONFIG_LOWBITDEPTH=1 -DAOM_EXTRA_C_FLAGS="-march=i686 -mstackrealign" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=...

64-bit
cmake -G"Unix Makefiles" /path/to/aom/ -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=/path/to/aom/build/cmake/toolchains/x86_64-mingw-gcc.cmake -DCONFIG_AV1_ENCODER=0 -DENABLE_TESTS=0 -DCONFIG_LOWBITDEPTH=1 -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=...
